title: Shepherd's Pie
directions: In large bowl mash potatoes with sour cream. Add salt and pepper, set aside. In large skillet, cook beef with onion until meat is no longer pink, drain. Stir in garlic salt into meat. Stir in soup, corn, peas, and milk.
Spread meat mixture into a 13x9in backing dish. Top with mashed potatoes, drizzle with butter.
Bake, uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. For additional browning, place under broiler for a few minutes.
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 oz) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
